mean_cn: adj. 不足以令人相信的
mean_en: not able to make you believe that something is true, real, or acceptable :not convincing
sentence: His recommendation of the whitening cosmetics is so unconvincing.
sentence_trans: 包大人推荐的美白化妆品也太不可信啦。
word_etyma: un不 ＋ con全部 ＋ vinc征服 ＋ ing使...的 → 不能完全征服的 → unconvincing不足以令人相信的
